Cortez's new drink:

Hurricane Dorian 

3 ounces of Rum
1 ounce of Lib Tears
1 shake of Bitters
4 ounces of Rum
1 Large Pickle
2 Medium Pearl Onions
5 ounces of Rum
2 shakes of Bitters
Place ingredients in bartenders mouth. Gargle. Spit over cracked ice. Serve in shot glasses.https://twitter.com/SaraCarterDC/status/1169058532865597440 …
